channel.title: Mining class
channel.description:
Hello, was testing mining and the batching of it.
It mines 9 times a row if you're 99 mining yes.. But the batching should be 9 times if you're failing utill you get a ore = stop.
Not like it is right now even if you get a ore it continue mining.. so you can get up to 9 ores at a time.. and sometimes you get 3x ores in 1 mining retry.
and the best of it the longer you mine, the faster u get ores cause the loop leaves on ...
No author good.. i would've teached him a lesson about calling same method inside method!!

item.title: Mining class
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

Are ‘batched’ skills going to be on moparrsc?

owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("You manage to obtain some " + ore.getDef().getName() + "."); owner.setSkillLoops(0);
setSkillLoops doesn’t stop the loop?

Eh I don’t have a plugin system (yet) on my version :S so idk

Read full topic

item.title: Mining class
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

[quote=“NoLives, post:2, topic:425376”]The 3 ores at a time might have to do with the feature you had in a few days back.
Where you had a 10 percent chance to get double ore/fish etc.
Just an idea though.[/quote]
Nothing to do with that, since the server source was completely changed, not to mention that was removed 3 days ago :P.

Read full topic

item.title: Mining class
item.dc:creator: @Crooks Crooks
item.description:
@Crooks wrote:

Hello, was testing mining and the batching of it.

It mines 9 times a row if you’re 99 mining yes…
But the batching should be 9 times if you’re failing utill you get a ore = stop.

Not like it is right now even if you get a ore it continue mining… so you can get up to 9 ores at a time… and sometimes you get 3x ores in 1 mining retry.

and the best of it the longer you mine, the faster u get ores cause the loop leaves on
…

No author good… i would’ve teached him a lesson about calling same method inside method!!
